summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 LEXUS ES350. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS). THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT CALLED PERFORMANCE LEXUS RIVERCENTER (633 W 3RD ST, COVINGTON, KY 41011) TWICE TO SCHEDULE APPOINTMENTS FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. BOTH TIMES, THE DEALER INITIALLY STATED THAT PARTS WERE AVAILABLE AND SCHEDULED AN APPOINTMENT FOR THE CONTACT. THE DEALER LATER CANCELED THE APPOINTMENTS, STATING THAT THEY DID NOT HAVE THE PARTS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
